In the definition of Linear.backward(), which is an example of implementing Linear Function, there are several self.needs_input_grad where self should have been ctx, as backward is implemented as a @staticmethod.

body:
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/notes/extending.html#extending-torch-autograd

In the definition of `Linear.backward()`, which is an example of implementing Linear Function, there are several `self.needs_input_grad` where `self` should have been `ctx`, as `backward` is implemented as a `@staticmethod`.
